Symbiome Recharge002 Postbiomic Oil

Brand: Symbiome

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Passiflora Edulis (Passion Fruit) Seed Oil, Caryocar Brasiliense (Pequi) Fruit Oil, Mauritia Flexuosa (Buriti) Fruit Oil

Directions: Apply 3-4 drops to face and neck, morning and evening.
